attributes.action: Allow Tyler Gregory Okonma (aka Tyler the Creator), to enter the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: Upon the initial ban in 2015, Tyler was told that he was banned for '3-to-5 years.' It is now 2018 and there is no news of his ban being lifted.
attributes.background:
Tyler Gregory Okonma is a well respected American Rapper who was banned from entering the United Kingdom due to his lyrics being a 'threat to public safety.'
Many of his fans from the UK, including myself, are unable to travel to other countries in order to see him perform live.
